item.description:
If animation is an expression of one's soul, then (director) Signe Baumane's soul according to film she made with her ten animated films (1991-2005) range from an entertaining whore ("Five F***ing fables) to a monk searching for the Meaning of Life ("The Gold of the Tigers"). In between those two extremes you'll find enthusiastic dentists, talking animals and flowers, dragons hurt by innocent girls and vacuum cleaners willing to protect housewives. Not for children.

Admission is only $3.00

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Kino Kafe - Ten Animated Films
